reasoning_of_region: The problem involves a geometric setup with a rubber band being stretched, which is best represented by a diagram.
problem_understanding: A rubber band of length 16 cm is fixed at both ends on a table. Its midpoint is pulled vertically upwards by 6 cm. The task is to determine how much the rubber band is stretched.

known.name: original_length
known.note: Length of the rubber band when unstretched.

known.name: vertical_displacement
known.note: Vertical distance the midpoint is pulled upwards.

relations: The rubber band forms two right triangles when the midpoint is pulled up.
constraints: The rubber band is fixed at both ends and only the midpoint is moved.

reasoning_of_task: The problem requires understanding the geometric change in the rubber band when pulled upwards.
problem_summary: Determine the amount by which a rubber band is stretched when its midpoint is pulled vertically upwards.

knowns.name: vertical_displacement
knowns.note: Vertical distance the midpoint is pulled upwards.

constraints: The rubber band is fixed at both ends and only the midpoint is moved.
visual_facts: The rubber band forms two right triangles when the midpoint is pulled up.
